name: Minidice
description:
Hi, we  are happy to present Minidice, a strategy game about fighting  vegetables with  dice of sugar.

The game is quite low,  mostly during screen transition, but it's because we have quality graphics  made by an excellent artist ^^. If you got trouble with the browser play, consider  the downloadable versions.

We made this game for the GMTK game jam of 2022, the theme was "Roll the dice".

Have fun, don't hesitate to ask question in comments !
